content: i adore knitting socks especially 2 at a time and toe-up my kids love them and i can t make them fast enough my answer is kroy sock yarn i personally find it to be thicker than fingering weight more like a sport weight yarn using 3 mm needles i can whip off socks for my appreciative kids and even me in no time flat add to that fact that kroy is virtually indestructible is inexpensive and comes in some really great colourways that can appeal to kids and the young at heart it s a win/win/win this is such a simple pattern that you can be knitting at the soccer field hockey rink knitting group or wherever you may be without being chained to a pattern or chart i find i need a project like this on the needles for times when my attention is divided i have provided links in the pattern for casting on and casting off instructions on youtube this is my first free pattern and i hope you enjoy it
